overview: Documentary about people and their towns (Abideira, Porto, Castro Candaz, Santa Marta, Pincelo, Ponte fortes, A Samugueira, San Paio, Mourulle, Portomeñe, A Hermida, Ribó...), flooded by the reservoir of Belesar in 1963. Real images and sound of the Ribeira Sacra and the Miño river, of the houses remains, of the cellars, the trees, and, more importantly, and especially, of the testimonies of ten people that lived in these places before the construction and that were forced to leave everything behind.
title: Flooded
